SEARCH
Package gw.sampledata

Class ExchangeRatesLoader

java.lang.Object
gw.sampledata.ExchangeRatesLoader
public final class ExchangeRatesLoader extends Object
A builder-style loader class for configuring and loading exchange rates. This class allows setting various parameters like bundle, effective date, expiration date, forced reload, and normalization of rates before triggering the data loading process.

This class supports method chaining, allowing multiple configurations to be applied sequentially.

  • Method Details

    • withBundle

      public ExchangeRatesLoader withBundle(@Nullable Bundle bundle)
      Sets the bundle to be used for loading exchange rates.
      Parameters:
      bundle - the Bundle to use, or null to use a new internal bundle.
      Returns:
      this ExchangeRatesLoader instance for method chaining.

    • withEffectiveDate

      public ExchangeRatesLoader withEffectiveDate(Date effectiveDate)
      Sets the effective date for the exchange rates to be loaded.
      Parameters:
      effectiveDate - the effective date of the exchange rates.
      Returns:
      this ExchangeRatesLoader instance for method chaining.

    • withExpirationDate

      public ExchangeRatesLoader withExpirationDate(@Nullable Date expirationDate)
      Sets the expiration date for the exchange rates to be loaded.
      Parameters:
      expirationDate - the expiration date of the exchange rates, or null if none.
      Returns:
      this ExchangeRatesLoader instance for method chaining.

    • withForcedReload

      public ExchangeRatesLoader withForcedReload(boolean forcedReload)
      Specifies whether to forcefully reload the exchange rates even if data already exists.
      Parameters:
      forcedReload - true to force a reload of the data, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      this ExchangeRatesLoader instance for method chaining.

    • withNormalizedRates

      public ExchangeRatesLoader withNormalizedRates(boolean normalizedRates)
      Specifies whether the exchange rates should be normalized based on a base currency for the administrative screens.
      Parameters:
      normalizedRates - true to normalize rates using the base currency, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      this ExchangeRatesLoader instance for method chaining.
